title: The Home of the Wings - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Politics   R-15   Sickly Characters
author: 妹尾 ゆふ子
description:
Yaet, the imperial secretary who has the power “to see the past”. This sickly man dreamt of living a plain retirement life in the North where he was demoted. However, he had his hands full with the Northern folk who didn’t understand the politics and the highly motivated Princess, who was newly appointed as the governor of the north.

As Yaet learned more about North, he also realized the Empire’s secret that lay in this land…

The door of a magnificent fantasy romance woven by the light and shade of history will now open――>
